description: There is an undirected connected tree with n nodes labeled from 0 to n - 1 and n - 1 edges. You are given a 0-indexed integer array nums of length n where nums[i] represents the value of the ith node. You are also given a 2D integer array edges of length n - 1 where edges[i] = [ai, bi] indicates that there is an edge between nodes ai and bi in the tree. Remove two distinct edges of the tree to form three connected components. For a pair of removed edges, the following steps are defined: Return the minimum score of any possible pair of edge removals on the given tree.
